item.description:
In reply to <a href="/amillennialism-and-the-age-to-come-a-critical-review-1/#comment-454">DANA CASTALDO</a>.
Dana, I share your enthusiasm to read Dr. Waldron's review of this work. I also share your locale. I live in Santa Clarita. Not sure where you are fellowshipping while you are at TMU, but if you are looking for a Reformed Baptist community we meet right around the corner. www.cbcscv.com
Grace and Peace!

item.title: By: DANA CASTALDO
item.dc:creator: DANA CASTALDO
item.description: Thank you so much for addressing this book. I am a student at The Master's College and was given a copy from a brother (who I have been sharing the two age schema with) and he feels this is the strongest refutation to ammilenialsim to date. curiously, outside of the 1 critical Amazon review, there is virtual radio silence from the normal ammilenial channels that I know of. I really found that strange indeed our disponsational brother is any barometer of others opinions inside that camp. I sincerely look forward to your critique. Thanks Dr. Waldron!
